title: Monetary Policy
description: The Federal Reserve Board of Governors in Washington DC.
cleaned_text: Monetary Policy Monetary policy in the United States comprises the Federal Reserve's actions and communications to promote maximum employment, stable prices, and moderate long-term interest rates--the economic goals the Congress has instructed the Federal Reserve to pursue. Review of Monetary Policy Strategy, Tools, and Communications In a review conducted over 2019 and 2020, the Fed took a step back to consider whether the U.S. monetary policy framework could be improved to better meet future challenges. Here are the results.
